contentList.content: A bright pair of eyes encircled by seven silver stars adorn this bag.
The Newmoon armor was issued only to the most promising apprentice paladins of Selune. It's slightly cold to the touch even in the hottest of environs.

The Dame's resentment and anger toward Ketheric cannot be overstated. Still, her dreams rove sweeter corners, beyond the cruel hardwood floors of vengeance, the rooms of pain and discipline. Hers is a complex house, a house of the heart.
Nightsong's armour is evocative of her personality - prickly, hardy, and about as agreeable as a clenched fist.

The Dame's resentment and anger toward Ketheric cannot be overstated. Still, her dreams rove sweeter corners, beyond the cruel hardwood floors of vengeance, the rooms of pain and discipline. Hers is a complex house, a house of the heart.
Bestow the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag> upon yourself or an ally.
This weapon ignores <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Radiant and [1] damage.
The Fullmoon armor was issued only to the chosen of Selune. It has a silvery radiant glow and is slightly cold to the touch even in the hottest of environs.
The Fullmoon armor was issued only to the chosen of Selune. It has a silvery radiant glow and is slightly cold to the touch even in the hottest of environs.
A bright pair of eyes encircled by seven silver stars adorn this bag.
A bright pair of eyes encircled by seven silver stars adorn this bag.
The Fullmoon armor was issued only to the chosen of Selune. It has a silvery radiant glow and is slightly cold to the touch even in the hottest of environs.
A bright pair of eyes encircled by seven silver stars adorn this bag.
Isobel's boots are haphazardly repaired, and have a humble snug fit for the wearer, snug as strong faith in the chest of a religious devotee.

She prayed for words and received silence. She prayed for intimacy and slept alone. She prayed for fruit and ate charcoal. She prayed for death and wanted to live. Then she grew older, and received things she'd wanted.
Still she prayed.

A memory from her childhood: a warm bed. Through the cracked window, she could see the moonlight cupping the plums in the tree as if in silver hands. The name of the goddess Selûne came to her, and never left.
A small, silvered necklace, worn by Selûne worshippers. It is adorned with seven pieces of iolite, a blue gemstone used for navigation at sea.
This staff's blue inlays and moon-shaped ornamentation indicate its use among Selûne's clergy.
The Halfmoon armor was issued to the high ranking Paladins of Selune. Its silvery radiant glow cuts through the darkness like the moon itself.
The Halfmoon armor was issued to the high ranking Paladins of Selune. Its silvery radiant glow cuts through the darkness like the moon itself.

You restore an additional 2d4 + your <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> every time you heal another creature. They also regenerate 1d4 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> for two rounds.
You heal an extra 1d4 + your <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> and your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Modifier</LSTag>.
While <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">concentrating</LSTag>, add your <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> to your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">armour class</LSTag>.
While <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">concentrating</LSTag>, add your <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> to your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">armour class</LSTag>.
You gain +[1] to initiative and +[2] to Wisdom and Concentration <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">saving throws</LSTag> from your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.

Unlike their father, Thibault, Cherish Hollow was not afraid of zombies. Cherish was afraid of sharks, liquorice, wallpaper, Netherese artefacts, hats (large), the outdoors, the indoors, hats (small), and milk pails. Zombies were a bloody picnic.
Can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag> to a target position.
Can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag> to a target position.
A bright pair of eyes encircled by seven silver stars adorn this bag.
Legendary Cleric of Selûne Armory Backpack
